PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08772021-08-11,  ,  GAC,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectThe Acts of the 24th Congress of the Postal Union of the Americas, Spain and Portugal
PrecisOrder authorizing (1) the Prime Minister or the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take part in deliberations, to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the ACTS OF THE 24TH CONGRESS OF THE POSTAL UNION OF THE AMERICAS, SPAIN AND PORTUGAL; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to take part in deliberations, to vote and to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Acts.
AttachmentsAttachment
